author: David Beavers
title: D.C. mayor: Coronavirus casts ‘spotlight’ on African American health disparities
description: Preliminary data suggest Covid-19 is hitting black and brown Americans particularly hard.
content:
District of Columbia Mayor Muriel Bowser. | Patrick Semansky/AP Photo
Mayor Muriel Bowser of Washington, D.C., on Sunday said the coronavirus pandemic is casting a spotlight on health disparities among African Americans as early data suggests the virus is di… [+447 chars]
